item.title: Judicial strikes grow in Mexico over reform pushing currency lower
Maggots were released into DNC breakfast, FBI investigates how
item.description: ​Maggots were found in the breakfast service of the Democratic National Convention Wednesday morning following which the FBI launched an investigation to find out whether this was an activism-related incident. Fairmont Chicago hotel spokesperson Haley Robles confirmed to news outlets that a group of individuals caused a disruption at a DNC-related breakfast event at the hotel.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Top US oilfield firm Halliburton hit by cyberattack
At least 55 arrested after clashes with police outside Israeli Consulate in Chicago during DNC
item.description: At least 55 protesters were arrested in Chicago following violent clashes with police during the Democratic National Convention. Demonstrations focused on opposing the Israel-Hamas war, with intense confrontations near the Israeli Consulate. Chicago Police Superintendent Larry Snelling described the situation as a danger to the city, emphasizing the efforts made to de-escalate the conflict.

item.title: US job growth lower than estimated by 818,000, reveals revised data
item.dc:creator: TOI Business Desk

item.title: American Airlines passenger bleeds from hair transplant surgery, arrested for refusing to deboard
item.description: ​​A Las Vegas couple was arrested from an American Airlines plane after their resistance to deboard the plane when the flight crew asked them to do so as the man was profusely bleeding from his head. The bleeding was because of a hair transplant surgery and the man said he did not have a fresh bandage to cover his head. All passengers had to be deplaned and the flight was delayed as the couple said it they could not fly, no one else would either.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Biden to speak with Netanyahu on Gaza ceasefire talks, US official says
Donald Trump's son says he'd love to give a '3-letter agency' to RFK Jr
item.description: Amid speculations that independent candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr will drop out of the race and support Donald Trump if he gets a position in the administration, Trump Jr said he would love the idea of putting RFK Jr in charge of a three-letter agency and let him "blow it up".
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump says he's happy for his role in Joe Biden's 'demise': 'Good news is...'
item.description: As the Democrats eviscerated Donald Trump at the ongoing national convention in Chicago, the former president Wednesday began his day with a long rant against 'Comrade Kamala Harris, 'Barrack Hussain Obama', 'Crazy Nancy Pelosi', 'Lightweight movie state George Clooney' and 'Crooked Joe'.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Mike Lynch yacht sinking: Two more bodies discovered, not yet identified

item.title: Video of Harry-Meghan's salsa viral, ex-roommate shares Duchess Of Sussex' dance secret
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Trump is rich in only...': Billionaire Pritzker DNC speech viral; Republicans bodyshame him
item.description: Illinois Gov JB Pritzker's speech at the Democratic National Convention went viral as he poked fun at former president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump as said that Trump thinks that people should trust him on economy as he is rich. "Take it from an actual billionaire, Trump is rich in only one thing: stupidity," Pritzker said.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Andrew Tate's home in Romania raided amid new allegations involving minors
item.description: Andrew Tate's house in Romania was raided by police following allegations of human trafficking and money laundering. The raid, conducted by Romania’s DIICOT, involved searches at four locations. Tate, his brother Tristan, and two Romanian women were previously arrested in 2022. Prosecutors have formally indicted all four, though they have denied the charges.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Damn right': Kamala Harris' husband's ex-wife agrees on this about Trump-Melania
item.description: 'Kamala’s husband’s ex-wife is supporting her more enthusiastically than Trump’s current wife is supporting him," a social media user wrote after Kerstin attended the DNC. Kerstin reacted to the post and said 'Damn right' in agreement as Melania Trump remains missing from Donald Trump's campaign. Kerstin is a film producer who divorced Kamala's husband Doug Emhoff 14 years ago when Doug apparently cheated on her having had an affair during their marriage.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Andrew Tate, brother Tristan's residences raided by Romanian Police: What we know so far
item.description: Romanian police officers carried out fresh raids at the residences of controversial influencer Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan Tate in connection with the human trafficking and rape cases against Andrew Tate. One of the world’s best-known influencers, Andrew Tate is known for spouting his misogynist and divisive ideas to his millions of followers. The Tate brothers have been accused of having formed an organized criminal network in early 2021 in Romania and Britain. They have denied the charges and a trial date has not yet been set.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Bosnia high school staffer shoots dead three colleagues: police
